pages.title: Void Shadow
pages.text: Level: <level_t0>$(br2)After defeating $(boss/t1/the_eye)The Eye$(), a $(bold)floating island$() will appear. Enter the $(key)portal$() on it to reach the $(bold)domain$() of the $(key)Void Shadow$().$(br2)Inside the $(key)Void Shadow$() domain, you cannot manually place or break blocks.

$(br)While $(key)Void Shadow$() has at least half of its health, you can damage it by killing the $(key)minions$() it summons. Each kill deals up to $(bold)5%$() of $(key)Void Shadow$()'s max health.$(br2)When $(key)Void Shadow$() drops below half health, it enters an $(bold)enraged$() state. If you destroy all $(key)Void Fragments$() on the platform, it will stop circling and move to the center to finish the fight.
